title: Only a Fool
text: "Only a Fool" is the third single by Norwegian pop singer <a href="Marit%20Larsen">Marit Larsen</a>, released from her debut album "<a href="Under%20the%20Surface">Under the Surface</a>". The single spent only two weeks on the Norwegian Singles Chart and was only a radio release. It can only be purchased online as a single, as no hard copy is sold in stores.
